name: Marlin GeoNetwork Catalogue - CSIRO Marine Data
description: GeoNetwork data catalogue containing descriptions of many Marine National Facility (MNF) and Oceans and Atmosphere (O&A) datasets from research voyages, including underway, CTD, hydrology, ADCP, and species data, curated by the CSIRO Information and Data Centre.
owner_name: CSIRO (Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation)
